intro: Joined as the first developer beyond the founders, playing a pivotal role in scaling the company from Seed to post-Series A and driving key technical contributions across critical clinical experiments.

roles.name: Full-Stack Developer
roles.description:
- Designed & built scalable server-side RESTful APIs using Flask and OOP principles
- Engineered DB schemas and optimized data queries using PostgreSQL & SQLAlchemy
- Developed responsive web application with React and TypeScript
- Used RTK Query for efficient Redux-based API handling across tabs
- Integrated AWS EC2 and S3 for scalable cloud infrastructure and better file storing
- Set up CI/CD pipelines with Git for automated integration and deployment

roles.name: Software Developer
roles.description:
- Built several platforms as internal development tools in Python and PyQt5 for UI
- Solved performance and memory issues while loading large amount of data
- Coded scripts in C for Arduino Uno boards to integrate external devices

roles.name: TV Producer
roles.description:
- Produced live broadcasts, ensuring seamless operations under pressure
- Managed and organized a large video database for efficient content retrieval

roles.name: Owner, Operations & Marketing Manager
roles.description:
- Co-founded and operated a dance bar, managed marketing and on-site operations
- Produced large-scale nightlife events, including weekly club lines
- Led marketing strategy and promotional campaigns across social media
- Managed various teams, including recruitment, scheduling, and daily team leadership
